{"step_by_step_thinking": "The question is about the treatment of choice for CA maxillary sinus stage III (T3 No Mo). Based on the given documents, it can be seen that Stage III patients had a high 5-year survival rate of 72.2% in the study 'Retrospective evaluation of surgical intervention following chemo- and radiotherapy of maxillary sinus cancers'. This suggests that treatment with surgery + radiotherapy might be an effective option for these patients. Additionally, the document 'Management of advanced squamous cell carcinomas of the maxillary sinus' recommends a combination of preoperative radiation therapy and surgery as a recommended approach for patients with advanced-stage maxillary sinus cancer, which includes Stage III patients.", "answer_choice": "B"}
